import { Alert } from "bootstrap"; import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/centerCenter.css"; class Register extends Component { state = { username: "", email: "" }; handleClick(ev, userName, nickName, email, password, confirmPassword, bio) { const data = { "userName": userName, "nickName": nickName, "email": email, "password": password, "confirmPassword": confirmPassword, "bio": bio }; fetch("/app", { method: "POST", headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(data), }) .then((response) => console.log(response)) .then((data) => { console.log("Success:", data); }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error:", error); }); } render() { return (
